examples.example: 我已经清楚地了解了自己的目标和方向，会坚定不移地向前走。

translate.english: I have clearly understood my goals and directions, and will move forward unswervingly.

examples.example: 他把事情的来龙去脉讲得很清楚，大家一下子就明白了。

translate.english: He explained the ins and outs of the matter very clearly, and everyone understood it all at once.

examples.example: 老师把这个知识点讲解得非常清楚，同学们都很快理解了。

translate.english: The teacher explained this knowledge point very clearly, and the students all understood it quickly.
